DOC.brief_title: Study Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine Administered Via Intramuscular Route Children Adolescents Taiwan
DOC.detailed_description: Study participant vaccinate one dose QIV ( split-virion , inactivate ) NH 2013-2014 formulation intramuscular route deep subcutaneous . Immunogenicity assess baseline ( Day 0 ) 21 day injection ; also followed-up safety 21 day injection .
